name: Digital Flower
description: This piece is inspired by the generative art series 3_collatz_conjecture. Each line segment’s length and position are driven by the Collatz sequence, while noise(i * xAngle, index * yAngle) introduces subtle rotations, giving the branches a natural, floral structure.

name: Digital Tree
description: This piece is inspired by the generative art series 3_collatz_conjecture. Each branch grows according to the sequence values. Perlin noise introduces gentle rotations, and branches have a randomized 15% chance to split.

name: Flowers Bloom in the Sound of Rain
description: Inspired by an old computer wallpaper, whenever the audio input exceeds a certain threshold, it rains and flowers bloom. I think it’s really beautiful.

name: Firework
description: After looking at some particle art, I thought I could use particles to create a fireworks effect: when the audio input exceeds a certain volume threshold, a firework will launch.

name: Spiral One
description: This piece is inspired by the generative art series 5_spiral_rose. Color, brightness, saturation, radius, and the total number of particles are randomized, adding variation and visual depth.

name: Spiral Two
description: On the base of Spiral One, I added additive blending.

name: Firework Tone
description: On the base of Firework, i used tone.js to create a simple synthesizer that plays a sound when user clicks on the canvas.

name: Firework Tone 2
description: On the base of Firework, i used tone.js to create a simple synthesizer that plays a sound when user clicks on the canvas.
